api.name: ObParentFormDirective
api.usage: Should be applied to the root element with a formGroup directive. It will simply forward its submit and reset events.

variables.name: submit$
variables.text: An observable that emits each time the underlying form is submitted

variables.name: reset$
variables.text: An observable that emits each time the underlying form is reset

api.name: ObNestedFormComponent
api.usage: Should wrap a custom sub-component which contains a form.

inputs.name: nestedForm
inputs.text: The formGroup of the sub-component that is projected.
